author: John Watson
comment: It showed up after two reinstalls. Persist if you're having this issue because the watch face is very nice. Thanks to the dev for his swift reply and offer of help. It's appreciated.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey John, would you mind sending me an e-mail message? My address is flavioarfaria@gmail.com, I'm sure we'll make it work, ok? Thanks!

title: Update

author: Erik Persson
comment: Timely is one of the best looking apps out there and i havet been on the hunt for a watchface with the timely look since i got my 360. Really great job herr! Personally I'd like to see some features like bigger fonts and being able to see Phone battery status as well as watch battery. Weather would be cool too! Maybe even an analog clock option similar to the Timer/stopwatch feature in the timely app? Anyways, Really liking this and I am looking forward to future updates!

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Erik, thanks for your awesome feedback! I felt the same frustration you did when I got my 360, that's why I decided to do it myself. Most of the things you suggested are already on my mind (I considered Timely analog clock too) and I'll be adding lots of great things soon. Thanks again and enjoy it! ;)

title: Awesomely executed!

author: Richard Ely-Harris
comment: Absolutely beautiful faces just wish that we could make the time and date larger, it is too small for my eyes ;) Looking forward to this being in an update soon. If you are considering adding weather etc please make it optional as I reall would love to keep just the time and date. Thank you.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Richard, thanks for purchasing and for your feedback. You're not the only one wishing to have larger date and time. I'll be supporting larger text in the future. ;)

title: Beautiful

author: Josh Richards
comment: Absolutely love how this face looks. It would be even better if you could match the number size to the Moto 360's stock digital face for easier at a glance viewing. Off to a great start, and I can't wait to see how you improve it.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Yeah, Josh, I've been getting lots of feedback on time size. This is definitely something that needs to be improved. Keep an eye on the updates! ;) Thank you!

title: Beautiful

author: Jack Ady
comment: Dev was quick to respond to my concerns. Really nice animations on this face I haven't found anywhere else. Very excited for custom presets.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, Jack! Custom presets are almost done. ;)

title: Great interaction with dev

author: Paul Elias
comment: If you could add a phase beam theme, matching the colors from the live wallpaper that used to come on nexus devices I would be so excited :D also an option to remove the tiny bubbles coming from the bottom would be great

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Paul, you'll soon have some customization options to change the colors to match your wallpaper. ;)

author: Raijin Cobas
comment: Looks beautiful. Timely is definitely one of the best looking apps out there. Great job capturing the look and feel. If you can find a way to add weather without crowding the face too much it'd be perfect!

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Raijin, thanks for your feedback. Weather is definetly something I plan to add. It's the next priority after custom theme creation. Glad you're enjoying the watch face.

title: Great job!

author: Ian Bowers
comment: Looks great!  Would rock to have colors change with time of day or battery level, but I'm guessing these are already on your list of tricks for upcoming versions.  5/5 either way.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Yeah, there are many great things to add! Thanks for your feedback and support, glad you liked it. It will become even better in the future.

title: Looks fantastic.

author: mark coleman
comment: The first ever review from me.... just had to say that this is just a awesome face for my lg g watch r..... animations are smooth and delicate... we'll worth 99p cheers

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hi Mark! I'm really glad to know you liked it. ;) Thanks for purchasing!

title: Beautiful....

author: Gérson M.
comment: I would like to be able to make the time larger...its too small.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Gerson! Don't worry, this is in my tasks list and will be included in the upcoming versions, ok? ;)

title: No customization

author: Dustin Smith
comment: I love this theme, I'm really looking forward to future updates! I'd definitely like to see a weather option at some point down the road. . . . Edit - also the option for large cards!

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hi Dustin! Thanks for your feedback and support. This is the watch face I'm using on a daily basis and I also miss a few things like weather, battery charge, etc. I plan to add some of these things in the near future! There's still a lot to be improved. Thank you again for purchasing!

title: Bought it, love it!

author: Sherry Corbett
comment: Love this watch face. Will give 5 stars when weather and battery stats are added. Would also like the date a little larger. Great job dev!
title: Beautiful

author: Curtis Freeman
comment: 10/10 would do it again. Classy and elegant. No regrets. I like the clock closer to the top but would like the option to change fonts and make larger. GREAT JOB.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Wow Curtis, you have no idea how happy I feel when I get feedbacks like yours. There's a lot to improve, I'll be adding more features to the app. Thank you very much!

title: Classy and elegant

author: Kevin Taylor
comment: Have reinstalled 4 times, still not showing up as an option in Android wear. Please help!

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Kevin, this usually happens on Android Wear. Please write a message to flavioarfaria@gmail.com and we'll instantly make it work.Thanks!

title: Not showing up.

author: Giannis Thalassinos
comment: I love Timely, glad to see the same design on my moto 360 now. Looking forward to your updates.
title: I approve.

author: T- Smooth
comment: Well done! Just need a color wheel so we can adjust the colors to our exact color specifications.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Thanks T-Smooth! That's the next feature to be released. I'm doing my best to ship is as soon as possible. Thanks!

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: Can't wait to have more customizable options with font sizes and user color options.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Elizabeth! Really happy that you liked it. I'll include more themes in the next update. Custom preset support is also being added. Thanks!

title: Beautiful!

author: Kevin Ellison
comment: With all of the theme choices there are a lot of colors to coordinate  with suits.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Gabriela Faria
comment: The pink one is really cool! I love the bubble effect by the way...

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Really good to hear that. Thanks for your support! ;)

title: Great app!

author: Dave Courtemanche
comment: Very pretty, but hoping to be able to scale up the numbers in future versions.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Thanks, Dave! This is one of the most common suggestions I get. I'll provide support for larger numbers in the future. ;)

author: ChezJM D
comment: Very soothing, love it, larger fonts will be good, but love this watch face!
title: Nice!

author: Ryan Randolph
comment: Great looking, but how do I change the color of the face?

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Randolph, thanks for downloading. Open Android Wear app, then you'll see the currently selected watch face (Aquarium in this case). Click on the configuration cog that appears over the Aquarium screenshot and you're done! A list of color presets will appear. ;)

title: Beautiful

author: Ramon Guerrero
comment: Perfect design and layout. Definitely one of my regulars

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Ramon, great to hear it from you!!!! Thank you for your support!

author: jason delprete
comment: Love it! But, how do you change the settings??

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Jason, thanks! You can open the Android Wear app on your phone and click on the cog that appears over the watch face screenshot and they will appear. If you need further help, drop me a message at flavioarfaria@gmail.com. Thanks for downloading!

title: Excellent

author: Josean Candelario
comment: BEST!!!

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Thanks, Josean! It'll become even better! ;)

title: Best Watch Face

author: Lucio Paiva
comment: Beautiful design

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Thanks Lucio! Glad you're enjoying Aquarium on your wrist.

author: Charlie Anzman
comment: Nicely done

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Thanks, Charlie! ;)

author: Derek Ross
comment: Beautiful.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Thank you very much Derek! There's still a lot to improve! Glad to know you enjoyed it. ;)

author: joey bond
comment: Beautiful

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey Joey! Great to hear you're enjoying it! ;)

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hey! Thanks for your support! ;) Glad you enjoyed it.

author: Jennifer Ward
comment: I absolutely adore this watch face, I wouldn't change it's aesthetic at all-- and at first it was fine. I don't know what changed, it suddenly started being a battery hog, using just over 91% of my battery. Had to uninstall because it was getting down to <10% after a typical work day, dying during my shift more than once.

reply.author: Flávio Faria
reply.content: Hi Jennifer, sorry to hear that. I'd be glad if you could write to me at flavioarfaria@gmail.com to help me understand a bit of your usage profile. The app didn't get any update while you were using it, I suspect there could be something else... Please, write to me! ;) Thanks

title: Beautiful, Battery Eater

author: cbuc1125
comment: Bubbles should animate always.  After they stop, I can hardly see any movement.
title: More Bubbles
